trans-unit.source: This API will restart some or all the replicas of a partition at the same time (ensures all the replicas are down concurrently) depending on the <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.RestartPartitionMode</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This API will restart some or all the replicas of a partition at the same time (ensures all the replicas are down concurrently) depending on the <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.RestartPartitionMode</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: The ServiceManagementClient instance on which the API is called.
trans-unit.target: The ServiceManagementClient instance on which the API is called.

trans-unit.source: <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.PartitionSelector</codeEntityReference> that specifies the partition which needs to be restarted.
trans-unit.target: <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.PartitionSelector</codeEntityReference> that specifies the partition which needs to be restarted.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.RestartPartitionMode</codeEntityReference> which can be AllReplicasOrInstances or OnlyActiveSecondaries based on which the replicas to be restarted are selected.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.RestartPartitionMode</codeEntityReference> which can be AllReplicasOrInstances or OnlyActiveSecondaries based on which the replicas to be restarted are selected.

trans-unit.source: RestartPartitionResult which gives information about the actual selected partition.
trans-unit.target: RestartPartitionResult which gives information about the actual selected partition.

trans-unit.source: Action took more than its allocated time.
trans-unit.target: Action took more than its allocated time.

trans-unit.source: Any of the required arguments are null.
trans-unit.target: Any of the required arguments are null.

trans-unit.source: If the API is called for a partition belonging to a stateless service with <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.RestartPartitionMode</codeEntityReference> set to OnlyActiveSecondaries.
trans-unit.target: If the API is called for a partition belonging to a stateless service with <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.RestartPartitionMode</codeEntityReference> set to OnlyActiveSecondaries.

trans-unit.source: These are the fabric failures FabricErrorCode.PartitionNotFound - if the specified partition selected does not exist.
trans-unit.target: These are the fabric failures FabricErrorCode.PartitionNotFound - if the specified partition selected does not exist.

trans-unit.source: This API is useful to test the recovery time of a partition after a full or partial restart and also to test failover.
